headline: Myanmar Unrolls a Welcome Mat for the Leader of China, but Not All the Way
abstract: As Xi Jinping visits Myanmar, fighting in ethnic borderlands threatens China’s ambitious investment plans.
lead_paragraph: BANGKOK — As the leader of China, Xi Jinping, touched down in Myanmar on Friday, his two-day visit is designed to celebrate Beijing’s expanding presence in the region, both as an economic and political role model.
keywords: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
